0.0.1.name: wordpress/uuhello-search-integration-on-buddypress
0.0.1.description:
uuHello is a Vertical search engine. expert at Travel, Live, Shopping and e-Commerce domain. uuHello Search Integration on BuddyPress(http://usi.uuhello.com/) is a Plugin to help you integration Vertical Search function to your community. include:

  1. Business Search
  2. Travel Search
  3. Live Search
  4. Shopping Search
